author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In Turkish lands, where Lira's sway,
Falls swift 'pon Erdogan's triumph day,
For low stood rates, a course contest',
Yet UniCredit's gaze predicts duress.

For Puma's shares, such woe appears,
Baader Helvea quells the market's fears,
From add to buy, the rating soars,
Yet target's sum, from seventy, lowers.

When WPP with Nvidia fuses,
A content engine, AI new births,
For advertising, digital gleam,
Their union fuels a rapturous dream.

feedItems.title: Turkish Lira Falls as Erdogan Wins Presidential Election
feedItems.description: The Turkish lira fell after Erdogan’s win in Sunday’s runoff presidential election, as his controversial policy of keeping interest rates low has put pressure on the currency and will likely continue to do so, UniCredit said.

feedItems.title: Puma's Shares Seem to Price in Too Much Pessimism
feedItems.description: Puma’s share price suggests the market is pricing in a too pessimistic scenario for the company, Baader Helvea Baader said, raising its rating to buy from add, but cutting its target price to €60 from €70.

feedItems.title: WPP, Nvidia Partner in AI Deal
feedItems.description: WPP is teaming up with Nvidia to develop a content engine that uses generative AI for digital advertising.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In Stern's mind did clouds reside,
With mem'ry in twilight's keep,
As shadow's hand, it hath us sighed:
Seek answers in dementia's deep.

In market's calm, the quants they dance,
With signals swift their trades advance,
As other hands in rest do stand,
These lords of buying rule the land.

Wall Street now sighs, their hope in fray,
For miracles they yearn and pray,
A challenger to Biden, Trump,
In business fields may they triumph.

feedItems.title: Something Was Wrong With Dr. Stern. It Took Five Years to Figure Out.
feedItems.description: Early detection of dementia can help people make important life decisions and weigh possible treatments. But getting a diagnosis can be difficult.

feedItems.title: Why Are Markets So Calm? Quants Are Dominating
feedItems.description: Firms that use computers to determine buy and sell signals have been loading up while other investors sit back.

feedItems.title: Wall Street Mobilizes for a Presidential Election, Reluctantly
feedItems.description: The finance set wants a business-friendly challenger to Biden and Trump. “Everybody is hoping for a miracle.”

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In days of yore, when Midgard's might,
Ran strong in veins of AI's flight,
A dearth of chips, advanced and bold,
Left countless minds untamed, unsold.

Alas! Poor Disney's grand design,
Did falter, fail in sun-soaked clime,
Orlando's dreams did turn to woe,
For Magic Kingdom could not grow.

A treacherous tide hath swept the Strip,
Las Vegas' gold now lost in grip,
To cunning hosts, the players bane,
Blackjack's ill fortune, Loki's gain.

feedItems.title: The AI Boom Runs on Chips, but It Can't Get Enough
feedItems.description: A shortage of the kind of advanced chips that are the lifeblood of new generative AI systems has set off a race to lock down computing power and find workarounds.

feedItems.title: Disney's Orlando Campus Cancellation a Blow to Neighboring Projects
feedItems.description: Adjoining commercial and residential developments were banking on the relocation of 2,000 Walt Disney employees to Florida.

feedItems.title: Why You're Losing More to Casinos on the Las Vegas Strip
feedItems.description: Casinos are making it costlier to play and harder to win. Blackjack players lost nearly $1 billion on the Strip last year, according to data from the Nevada Gaming Control Board.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of C919's maiden flight, a tale I raise,
A challenge to Airbus and Boeing's claim,
In China's realm, a token doth amaze,
A frothy brew of rivalry in fame.

In data shrouds, a Chinese hand doth snare,
Access to figures hid from foreign eyes,
Their quest to grasp the wealth and faire,
A wine, reserved and veiled, they'd deign to prize.

The Mermaid Little now doth swim to shore,
With coin of ninety-five and million more,
In Disney's realm, a tale retold and dressed,
Live-action brew, by eager hearts possessed.

feedItems.title: China's homegrown C919 passenger jet made its long-awaited maiden commercial flight, marking a small but symbolic first challenge to Boeing and Airbus in one of their most important markets.
feedItems.description: China’s homegrown C919 passenger jet made its long-awaited maiden commercial flight, marking a small but symbolic first challenge to Boeing and Airbus in one of their most important markets.

feedItems.title: A Chinese data provider has started limiting international companies/ access to some information, makiig it harder for them to analyze how the world's second-largest economy is performing.
feedItems.description: A Chinese data provider has started limiting international companies/ access to some information, makiig it harder for them to analyze how the world’s second-largest economy is performing.

feedItems.title: Disney's "The Little Mermaid"  sold $95.5 million in domestic tickets in its first three days, leading the weekend box office with a performance that puts it in the middle of the studio's live-action remakes of an animated classic.
feedItems.description: Disney’s “The Little Mermaid” sold $95.5 million in domestic tickets in its first three days, leading the weekend box office with a performance that puts it in the middle of the studio’s live-action remakes of an animated classic.
